Package com.github.ignition.location.receivers

Class Summary
IgnitedBootReceiver This Receiver class is designed to listen for system boot.
IgnitedConnectivityChangedReceiver This Receiver class is designed to listen for changes in connectivity.
IgnitedLocationChangedReceiver This Receiver class is used to listen for Broadcast Intents that announce that a location change has occurred.
IgnitedPassiveLocationChangedReceiver This Receiver class is used to listen for Broadcast Intents that announce that a location change has occurred while this application isn't visible.
IgnitedPowerStateChangedReceiver The manifest Receiver is used to detect changes in battery state.
